con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="ld:ServicoFixa/logical/ServicoFixa_ws" name="ServicoFixa" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="ld:ServicoFixa/logical/ServicoFixa_ws" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <documentation>AquaLogic Data Services Web Service</documentation> <types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="ld:ServicoFixa/logical/ServicoFixa_ws" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:stns="ld:ServicoFixa/logical/ServicoFixa_ws" xmlns:dsns0="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/ServicoFixa"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/ServicoFixa"/> <xs:element name="servicoFixa"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="parametros"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="dsns0:ParamServicoFixa"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="servicoFixaResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="dsns0:ResultServicoFixa" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL"> <xsd:element name="FN_BUSCARSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="IDSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="CDSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="NMOPERACAOCOMERCIAL" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="INOFERTACLIENTEINADIMPLENTE" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PZDIASMAXIMOATENDIMENTO" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="PZMESVALIDADEPARQUE" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/ServicoFixa" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pag="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoWEB" xmlns:tns="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/ServicoFixa"> <xsd:element name="ParamServicoFixa"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdCanalAtendimento" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="cdSistemaOrigem" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="cdTipoServico" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="cdTipoSolicitacaoComercial" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="cdClasseLinha" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdGrupoComercial" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="cdFamiliaServico" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdCategoriaServico" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="cdCNL" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdServicoFiltro" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="nmServicoFiltro" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inPacote" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="S"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="inOfertaClientesInadimplentes" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="S"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="inOrdenacaoValorAssinaturaMensal" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="crescente"/> <xsd:enumeration value="decrescente"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listaTipoTecnologia" type="tns:ListaTipoTecnologia" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inVigenciaServico" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="analiseCredito" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdScore" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="inStatusAnaliseCredito" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="paginacao" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="pagina" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="quantidadePorPagina" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ListaTipoTecnologia"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="tipoTecnologia" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="codigo" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARSERVICOFIXA" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARSERVICOFIXA"> <xsd:element name="FN_BUSCARSERVICOFIXA"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="IDSISTEMASERVICO" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="CDCODIGO" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="CDCLASSESERVICOADICIONAL" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CDTIPOEQUIPAMENTO" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="INPOLITICAPRCLEGADO" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <!--Ainda não está aplicado--> <xsd:element name="INPREFACTIBILIDADE" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="INPOSFACTIBILIDADE" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="QTPERCENTUALAUDITORIA" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CDSISCOM" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="VLORDEMATND" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="NMCOMERCIAL" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="DESCRICAO" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DSNOTA" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CDNATUREZAPEDIDO" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <!--Verificar com Paulo, pois acredito que deveria estar dentro do tipo 'solicitacoesComerciais'--> <xsd:element name="INDISPONIVEL" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CDTIPOSERVICO" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="DSCTIPOSERVICO" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="CDFAMILIA" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="DSFAMILIA" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="CDCATEGORIA" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="DSCATEGORIA" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="SGTECNOLOGIA" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="INATRIBUTOSERVICO" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="IDSISTEMA" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="NUORDEMATENDIMENTO" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <!--Verificar com Paulo, pois até o momento o campo não está especificado--> <xsd:element name="INSTATUSANALISECREDITO" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARTARIFA" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARTARIFA"> <xsd:element name="FN_BUSCARTARIFA"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CDTARIFA" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="VLPRAZONAOFATURAMENTO" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CDTPTARIFA" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DSCTARIFA" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="VLTARIFA" type="xsd:double" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/ServicoFixa" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pag="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoWEB" xmlns:tns="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/ServicoFixa"> <xsd:element name="ResultServicoFixa"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="codigo" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="descricao" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="servicos" type="tns:ListaServicoDisponivel" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ListaServicoDisponivel"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="servicoDisponivel" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdServico" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdClasseServicoAdicional" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdAtributoClasseAdicional" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inPrecificacaoLegado" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inPreFactibilidade" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inPosFactibilidade" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="vlPercentualServicosAuditaveis" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdSyscom" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="nmServico" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="dsServico" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="dsNota" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdNaturezaPedido" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inVigenciaServico" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdTipoServico" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="dsTipoServico" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdFamiliaServico" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="dsFamiliaServico" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdCategoriaServico" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="dsCategoriaServico" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdTipoTecnologiaFixa" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="solicitacoesComerciais" type="tns:ListaSolicitacaoComercial" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inAtributoServico" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="cdSistemaOrigem" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="sequenciaPedido" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inStatusAnaliseCredito" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inDescontoServico" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ListaSolicitacaoComercial"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="solicitacaoComercial" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdSolicitacaoComercial" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="nmOperacaoComercial" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="inOfertaClientesInadimplentes" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="vlPrazoMaximoAtendimento" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="vlPrazoVigenciaProduto" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="tarifas" type="tns:ListaTarifa" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ListaTarifa"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="tarifa" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdTarifa" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="vlPrazoNaoFaturamento" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdTipoTarifa" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="dsTarifa" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="vlTarifa" type="xsd:double" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="servicoFixaIn"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:servicoFixa"/> </message> <message name="servicoFixaOut"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:servicoFixaResponse"/> </message> <portType name="ServicoFixaPT"> <operation name="servicoFixa"> <input message="tns:servicoFixaIn"/> <output message="tns:servicoFixaOut"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="ServicoFixaSoapBinding" type="tns:ServicoFixaPT"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <operation name="servicoFixa"> <soap:operation soapAction="ld:ServicoFixa/logical/ServicoFixa_ws/servicoFixa" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="ServicoFixaSoapService"> <port binding="tns:ServicoFixaSoapBinding" name="ServicoFixaSoapPort"> <soap:address location="http://aldsp-soa:80/ServicosEnablementCatalogoFixa/ALDSPWebService/ServicoFixa/logical/ServicoFixa.ws"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
